audioText: Du point de vue pratique, votre ventre sentira immédiatement les bienfaits de cette approche nutritionnelle révolutionnaire basée sur des recherches scientifiques approfondies.
question: From a practical standpoint, what will your stomach immediately feel?
options: The benefits of this revolutionary nutritional approach based on thorough scientific research
The digestive improvements from eliminating processed foods completely
The energy boost from consuming organic whole foods exclusively
The metabolic changes from following intermittent fasting protocols strictly
explanation: The correct answer is 'The benefits of this revolutionary nutritional approach based on thorough scientific research'. The text states 'Du point de vue pratique, votre ventre sentira immédiatement les bienfaits de cette approche nutritionnelle révolutionnaire basée sur des recherches scientifiques approfondies' - From a practical standpoint, your stomach will immediately feel the benefits of this revolutionary nutritional approach based on thorough scientific research. 'Sentira' is the future form of 'sentir' (to feel), and 'ventre' means 'stomach/belly'.
source: Strategic vocabulary development - practical nutrition context
